name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Jared Kushner lost his security clearance, and now he and Ivanka are trying to figure out their new limited roles. So far, their plan is to do terrible things on a much smaller scale.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: The president of China basically declared himself president for life. In a related story, President Trump was declared president for "what seems like a lifetime."

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Pizza Hut introduced a pair of athletic shoes that have a button that orders pizza. When they heard about it, fans of Pizza Hut said, "What are athletic shoes?"

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: Some Republicans are really angry about a joke at last night’s Oscars made about Mike Pence. My advice to those Republicans: Don’t watch the Tonys.

name: Conan O'Brian
monologue: The Academy Awards were last night and two of the biggest awards went to Mexican director Guillermo del Toro. So I’m guessing President Trump did not win his Oscar pool.
